import { useState } from "react" import { Search, Plus, Home, HardDrive, Users, Trash2, FileText, Folder, MoreVertical, Grid3X3, List, User, Settings, LogOut, } from "lucide-react" import "../styles/Home.css" export function HomePage() { const [viewMode, setViewMode] = useState("grid") const [isLoggedIn, setIsLoggedIn] = useState(true) const [showNewDialog, setShowNewDialog] = useState(false) const [showUserDropdown, setShowUserDropdown] = useState(false) const recentFiles = [ { id: 1, name: "Project Proposal.pdf", type: "pdf", modified: "2 hours ago", size: "2.4 MB" }, { id: 2, name: "Budget Spreadsheet.xlsx", type: "excel", modified: "1 day ago", size: "1.2 MB" }, { id: 3, name: "Meeting Notes", type: "folder", modified: "3 days ago", items: 12 }, { id: 4, name: "Design Assets", type: "folder", modified: "1 week ago", items: 24 }, { id: 5, name: "Contract.docx", type: "word", modified: "2 weeks ago", size: "856 KB" }, { id: 6, name: "Presentation.pptx", type: "powerpoint", modified: "3 weeks ago", size: "5.1 MB" }, ] const sharedFiles = [ { id: 7, name: "Team Resources", type: "folder", owner: "Sarah Chen", modified: "1 day ago", items: 8 }, { id: 8, name: "Q4 Report.pdf", type: "pdf", owner: "Mike Johnson", modified: "3 days ago", size: "3.2 MB" }, ] const getFileIcon = (type) => { switch (type) { case "folder": return default: return } } return (
